name: Drunken Driver
description:
This project is a submission to Low Effort Jam 15.

You are drunk and the road ahead you looks weird. Make sure to get home safely.

Press W to Accelerate and A/D keys to steer Left/Right.

4 levels with 1 Sandbox Area

Thanks a lot for trying out the game.

Credits for the Assets:

1) Speed Beast by Vunira Design - https://www.dafont.com/speedbeast.font

2) Music by purple-planet.com - https://www.purple-planet.com/themes

3) House Asset Pack by Mehdie Rabiee - https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/house-pack-35346

4) Rock Slide Sound Effect by Benboncan - https://soundbible.com/904-Rock-Slide.html

5) Terrain Tools Sample Asset Pack by Unity Technologies Inc.
